## About Me
My name is Andrew Wu and I am a first year MHS student in Epidemiology. I am a General Surgery Resident in training and currently taking dedicated time to do research in cardiovascular epidemiology at the Welch Center, BSPH, JHU. 

My research interest is clinical outcome and epidemiology in cardiovascular surgery


## Education
MD, Medicine, China Medical University, Taichung, 2019 

MHS, Cardiovascular Epidemiology, Johns Hopkins University, 2026 (expected)
